name: Combat de stickman
description:
The world is now at the brink of chaos and destruction after a siege by a mysterious evil. A Stickman Hero must rise to embark on a treacherous journey to defeat the evil forces and protect the world from aliens.

How to Play Combat De Stickman Games :

- Simply use the navigation button to move
- tap the attack button to hit Stickman Monsters
- tap jutsu button so you can use skill power to destroy all Stickman Monsters

Enjoy!!!
